channel.title: tidy tuesday on Brendan Graham
channel.description: Recent content in tidy tuesday on Brendan Graham

item.title: Getting started with topic modeling with dog breed traits
item.description: This post looks at a TidyTuesday data set about dog breeds. After looking at the data I try developing my first topic model

item.title: Combining 'Traditional' and Text-Based Models to Board Game Ratings
item.description: This post looks at a past TidyTuesday data set about board game ratings. After looking at the data I attempt to predict avereage board game

item.title: Comparing Traditional and Text-Based Models to Predict Chocolate Rating
item.description: This post looks at a TidyTuesday data set about chocolate. After looking at the data I compare text based and “traditional” modelling approaches to predict a chocolate ratings

item.title: Trying out new Tidymodels package: vetiver
item.description: This post looks at a TidyTuesday data set about changes in bee colonies After looking at the data I build and locally deploy a model api to predict the percentage of colonies lost

item.title: Comparing Variability in Ultra Trail Running Results Across Countries
item.description: This post looks at a past TidyTuesday data set about ultra trail running. After looking at the data I attempt to quantify and compare the variation in rankings between countries.

item.title: Modeling the Relationship between Whipped Cream and Calories of Starbucks Drinks
item.description: This post looks at a TidyTuesday data set about the contents of various Starbucks drinks. After epxploring the data I model the effect whiped cream has on calories across variosu types of drinks.
